title: You can lead a horse to water …
text:
This talk is about:
Environment management
environment <- culture

How do we make the vet school environment compatible with the Posit::Conf environment?

title: You can lead a horse to water …
section: By the end of this talk
text:
By the end of this talk
I will describe our three approaches:

Changing formal data science teaching
Changing workplace culture
Changing operational practice

You tell me what I’m missing

http://pos.it/slido-B | @jillymackay.bsky.social

Public Engagement

Open Educational Resources (MOOCs)
Bachelors of Veterinary Medicine and Surgery, Bachelors of Science (Agriculture) , Bachelors of Science (Veterinary Science)*
Applied Animal Behaviour and Animal Welfare (On Campus) , Animal Biosciences (On Campus) , Planetary Health (Blended) , Sustainable Lands and Cities (Blended) , Advanced Clinical Practice (Online) , Advanced Veterinary Practice (Online) , Applied Conservation Genetics with Wildlife Forensics (Online), Applied Poultry Science (Online) , Clinical Animal Behaviour (Online) , Conservation Medicine (Online) , Equine Science (Online) , Food Safety (Online) , Global Food Security and Nutrition (Online) , International Animal Welfare, Ethics and Law (Online) , One Health (Online) , Veterinary Anaesthesia and Analgesia (Online) , Doctorate in Veterinary Medicine (Resident)**
Masters by Research , Doctor of Philosophy (PhD)
